questions.question_text: What is used to create a link on an HR Case form that accesses information outside the application?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
HR Implementation ebook page 186: The Link Generator is used to create a link on the HR Case form that hyperlinks to an external site.

Selected Answer: B
correct

questions.question_text: When configuring a PDF Document Template, how does the system map form fields to ServiceNow fields?

choices.A: The Document field type on the PDF Template Mappings record
choices.B: The Preview value field on the PDF Template Mappings record
choices.C: The Mapping field on the PDF Template Mappings record
choices.D: The Document field on the PDF Template Mappings record

discussion.content: C is correct

comments.content: In the PDF Document Template record, you'll find a related list called "Field Maps". Here, you can create new records to map each PDF form field to a ServiceNow field. You do this by specifying the PDF form field's name and selecting the corresponding ServiceNow field.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
HR Fundamentals ebook page 134

Selected Answer: C
From the fundemantals training book: 
he HR Leadership team wants to personalize PDF documents by using field mapping to pre-fill information from ServiceNow tables into HR Document Templates.

Selected Answer: C
C is correct one.

Selected Answer: C
C is correct
C is correct answers

Selected Answer: C
C is correct

https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/utah-employee-service-management/page/product/human-resources/task/PDFTemplateMapping.html

correct answer is C ; mapping field - Field that maps information into your document.
https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/utah-employee-service-management/page/product/human-resources/task/edit-pdf-mappings.html

Selected Answer: A
correct

questions.question_text: If the Match All field is checked on a User Criteria record, the user:

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Correct answer is D

Selected Answer: D
D is correct. HR Fundmentals ebook p.169

Selected Answer: D
HR Fundamentals ebook page 169: If the Match All field is checked, the user must satisfy all of the selected criteria to meet the conditions.

Selected Answer: D
D correkt

Selected Answer: D
Correct answer is D
Must be D "all" = Match all

choices.C: Must satisfy a majority percentage of the criteria to meet the conditions.
choices.D: Must satisfy all of the selected criteria to meet the conditions.
choices.B: Must satisfy at least of the criteria to meet the conditions.
choices.A: Must satisfy at least one of the criteria to meet the conditions.

choices.D: Add it to the Contextual Search configuration
choices.C: All Knowledge bases are searched by default
choices.A: Add it to the HR Template
choices.B: Add it to the HR Service configuration

questions.question_text: If a new HR Knowledge base is created, how can it be included in the Knowledge results section on the HR Case form?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Correct answer : D

Selected Answer: D
HR Fundamentals ebook page 187: The Knowledge bases searched for the Knowledge results section on an HR Care are determined by the Contextual Search configuration. This means that if a customer has any new HR knowledge bases, those articles will not be returned in the knowledge results section unless the Contextual Search configuration is updated.
Correct Answer is B.

comments.content: p.201 : Correct answer is D: Contextual Search configuration
